items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.storedescription:
Head: Spray adhesive residue, and let soak for two minutes. Spray a second time, and wipe clean. The release time will depend on adhesive buildup. Remove residue, shampoo, and rinse. Saturating the adhesive area and wiping off the residue once breakdown has occurred will help give the best results. We recommend performing a patch test before use.

 

 

System: Once removed from the scalp, soak in a bowl of Walker Solvent while cleaning the head.


 

To Do a Solvent Soak: Fill a large bowl or sink with Walker Solvent. Place the system into the solvent, base side up. Keep the system submerged and work the adhesive build up off. Wear gloves to keep your hands out of direct contact with the solution. Shampoo the system and rinse. Soak times vary from 5-30 minutes, depending on the type of system and adhesive used.
